projects.title: Dove Dream Project - Hindustan Unilever
projects.description: Led end-to-end product development and packaging design for Hindustan Unilever's Dove brand. Managed cross-functional collaboration between design, manufacturing, and brand teams to deliver innovative packaging solutions meeting global quality standards.
keyFeatures: Collaborated with Hindustan Unilever brand team

projects.title: Customer Journey Framework
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive customer onboarding and service journey framework that transformed the customer experience. Achieved 90% customer satisfaction score through systematic touchpoint optimization and service excellence initiatives.

projects.title: Enterprise ERP Implementation
projects.description: Spearheaded the implementation of Odoo ERP across the organization, partnering directly with the Odoo team to develop a tailored solution. Drove digital transformation and process automation across multiple departments.

projects.title: Workforce Cultural Transformation
projects.description: Led a comprehensive cultural transformation initiative for 350+ blue-collar employees. Implemented reward and recognition programs, performance analytics, and engagement strategies that significantly improved workforce productivity and morale.

projects.title: Lacoste Marketing Strategy Challenge
projects.description: Competed in the prestigious Lacoste International Marketing Strategy Challenge at EDHEC Business School. Developed comprehensive market analysis, brand positioning strategy, and go-to-market plan that earned Runner-up position among international teams.

projects.title: Trade Show Marketing - Cosmoprof & CMPL
projects.description: Drove market expansion by representing the company at premier industry exhibitions including Cosmoprof Mumbai and CMPL Delhi. Led high-impact marketing campaigns, client engagement activities, and brand showcasing initiatives.
